00022 #ifndef settings_h
00023 #define settings_h
00024 
00025 #include <math.h>
00026 #include <inttypes.h>
00027 /// LETARTARE
00028 #include "nuts_bolts.h"
00029 #include "defaults.h"    // define  AXIS_T_TYPE
00030 
00031 /// date of construction
00032 #define GRBL_VERSION_BUILD "20140426"
00033 /// version
00034 #define GRBL_VERSION "0.845"
00035 
00036 /// 845 : the axes  -> GRBL_AXIS
00037 #if (AXIS_T_TYPE == LINEAR)
00038     #if AXIS_T == AXIS_U
00039   #define GRBL_AXIS  "(X, Y, Z, U)"
00040  #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_V
00041   #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z, V)"
00042  #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_W
00043   #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z, W)"
00044  #else
00045   #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z)"
00046  #endif
00047 #elif (AXIS_T_TYPE == ROTARY)
00048  #if AXIS_T == AXIS_A
00049   #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z, A)"
00050  #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_B
00051   #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z, B)"
00052  #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_C
00053   #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z, C)"
00054  #else
00055   #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z)"
00056  #endif
00057 #else
00058  #define GRBL_AXIS "(X, Y, Z)"
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 
00062 // Version of the EEPROM data. Will be used to migrate existing data from older versions of Grbl
00063 // when firmware is upgraded. Always stored in byte 0 of eeprom
00064 #define SETTINGS_VERSION 5
00065 
00066 // Current global settings (persisted in EEPROM from byte 1 onwards)
00067 typedef struct {
00068 /// 843 : 4 -> N_AXIS,  X, Y, Z, T = U xor A
00069   double steps_per_mm[N_AXIS];  //  X, Y, Z, T in [U,V,W,A,B,C]
00070 /// 844
00071   double steps_per_degree[N_AXIS];  // rotary : none, none, none, A or B or C
00072   uint8_t microsteps;
00073   uint8_t pulse_microseconds;
00074   double default_feed_rate;
00075   double default_seek_rate;
00076   uint8_t invert_mask_stepdir;
00077   uint8_t invert_mask_limit;
00078   double mm_per_arc_segment;
00079   double acceleration;
00080   double junction_deviation;
00081   uint8_t spindle_pwm;
00082   uint32_t default_spindle;
00083   double max_spindle;
00084 } settings_t;
00085 extern settings_t settings;
00086 
00087 /*  version 0.8c
00088 / Global persistent settings (Stored from byte EEPROM_ADDR_GLOBAL onwards)
00089 typedef struct {
00090   float steps_per_mm[3];
00091   uint8_t microsteps;
00092   uint8_t pulse_microseconds;
00093   float default_feed_rate;
00094   float default_seek_rate;
00095 *  uint8_t invert_mask;
00096   float mm_per_arc_segment;
00097   float acceleration;
00098   float junction_deviation;
00099 *  uint8_t flags;  // Contains default boolean settings
00100 *  uint8_t homing_dir_mask;
00101 *  float homing_feed_rate;
00102 * float homing_seek_rate;
00103 *  uint16_t homing_debounce_delay;
00104 *  float homing_pulloff;
00105 *  uint8_t stepper_idle_lock_time; // If max value 255, steppers do not disable.
00106 *  uint8_t decimal_places;
00107 *  uint8_t n_arc_correction;
00108 //  uint8_t status_report_mask; // Mask to indicate desired report data.
00109 } settings_t;
00110 extern settings_t settings;
00111 */
00112 
00113 // Initialize the configuration subsystem (load settings from EEPROM)
00114 void settings_init();
00115 
00116 // Print current settings
00117 void settings_dump();
00118 
00119 // Handle settings command
00120 uint8_t settings_execute_line(char *line);
00121 
00122 // A helper method to set new settings from command line
00123 void settings_store_setting(int parameter, double value);

00125 #endif
